Pre-Game Insights: The Pakistan cricket team led by Babar Azam landed at Ahmedabad for the high-octane clash against India on 14 October.
The match will be played at the Narendra Modi stadium and is expected to witness a full house.
The Pakistan team arrived in Ahmedabad from Hyderabad on Wednesday.
The team was congratulated by the airline crew for the record-breaking chase against Sri Lanka.
India secured an eight-wicket win against Afghanistan in the ninth match of the tournament at Arun Jaitley Stadium in New Delhi.
India captain Rohit Sharma urged his side to keep their focus on 'things we can control' ahead of the mega World Cup clash against Pakistan.
Gujarat Cricket Association (GCA) President Dhanraj Nathwani stated that all preparations are in place for hosting the high-voltage match as per ICC and BCCI standards.
Nathwani expressed pride in hosting the most important game of the ODI World Cup 2023 along with the opening and final match.
